#text=As my car was not working correctly I decided to take a public bus .
#text=I called the bus depot and asked how much tickets where and the departure times .
#text=The rates where reasonable for what I needed and I really did n't have a choice in the matter as my own car was messed up .
#text=I had a friend take me to the bus stop where I purchased my round trip ticket and prepared to wait for the bus to load and leave to take me to my destination .
#text=I went to the restroom to double check my concealed handgun and make sure it was cocked , locked , and loaded as you can never be too safe .
#text=My gun was fine so I tucked it under my shirt and boarded the bus .
#text=I found a seat near the back where I could see most of the other passengers and kicked back to make the trip .
